original_text: (For ye know how we have dwelt in the land of Egypt; and how we came through the nations which ye passed by;
korean_text: (우리가 애굽 땅에서 살았던 것과 너희가 여러 나라를 통과한 것을 너희가 알며

sentences.original_text: For ye know how we have dwelt in the land of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 우리가 애굽 땅에 거하였던 것을 앎이라

sentences.original_text: and how we came through the nations
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리가 여러 나라를 지나왔던 것을 앎이라
